step.message: Welcome aboard the follow e-tron!
Welcome to the driver's tutorial for the follow me e-tron!
Episode 3: Keyboard
Keyboard
This tutorial will walk you through all the special keys.
Try the keys out!
Part 1: Driving keys
The key w is full pedal, it makes the car go forward
The key s is full brakes, it slows the car down.
The key a is used to turn left, it can only be used if the car is at a certain speed.
The key d is used to turn right. It also has the same property as the 'a' key.
The key shift>b is used for activating the parking brake.
Part 2: Lights
The key [ is used to toggle the left indicator lights.
The key ] is used to toggle the right indicator lights.
The key f toggles the false lights
The key l walks you through the different powers of the headlight.
The key k toggles high beam lights
The key j flashes the high beam.
Part 3: Other commands
Space key activates the horn.
Part 4: Autodrive
The key c activates the auto speed lock system.
The key e activates the "auto crash" system and the autopilot system.
Part 5: Views
The key tab changes your viewpoint
The key x makes you zoom in.
The key shift>x makes you zoom out.
The key v cycles the viewpoints.
That's it for the keys.
If you need extra help on the keys, go to Help > Aircraft Help menu
Also take a look at Help > Common Aircraft Keys
Check the other two tutorials for centre console and dashboard for extra help
Enjoy driving!
